text: Robinus Syngkon is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Meghalaya Legislative Assembly from Mowkaiaw in the 2013 Meghalaya Legislative Assembly election as a member of the Independent. He joinedMy NetaFour MLAs to join BJP todayMr Justine Dkhar, Mr. Robinus Syngkon MLA from Meghalaya formally joint BJP today ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Meghalaya Legislative Assembly Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Meghalaya Category:People from West Jaintia Hills district Category:Meghalaya MLAs 2013–2018
title: Robinus Syngkon
